<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns array with all [[taskCompleted | uncompleted]] tasks for the given agent. [[getVariable]] could be used on [[Task]] to get the following special local variables from the task:

* <tt>"_this"</tt> [[Team Member]] - the [[teamMember]] [[agent]] the task is assigned to
* <tt>"_taskType"</tt> [[String]] - the name of the task (see [[registeredTasks]])
* <tt>"_thisCreated"</tt> [[Number]] - 1 or 0
* <tt>"_thisRunning"</tt> [[Number]] - 1 or 0
* <tt>"_totalCreated"</tt> [[Number]] - total number of tasks
* <tt>"_totalRunning"</tt> [[Number]] - total number of running tasks
* <tt>"_task"</tt>[[Task]] - often null</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''currentTasks''' teamMember </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> teamMember: [[Team Member]] - [[teamMember]] [[agent]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - array of [[Task]]s </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[currentTasks]] [[teamMember]] _agent</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[taskCompleted]], [[registerTask]], [[registeredTasks]], [[unregisterTask]], [[sendTask]], [[createTask]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
